    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Customer
    Entity representing a customer in the system.
    DateUtil
    Utility class for handling common date and time operations.
    Employee
    Entity representing an employee in the system.
    EmployeeController
    REST Controller for managing Employee-related operations.
    EmployeeRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Employee entities.
    Inventory
    Entity representing an inventory item in the system.
    InventoryController
    REST Controller for managing Inventory-related operations.
    InventoryItem
    Projection interface for representing inventory item usage data.
    InventoryRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Inventory entities.
    JwtAuthProvider
    Custom AuthenticationManager implementation for JWT-based authentication.
    Main
    Entry point for the Spring Boot application.
    MenuIngredient
    Entity representing an ingredient used in a menu item.
    MenuIngredientRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on MenuIngredient entities.
    MenuIngredientSerializer
    Custom serializer for the MenuIngredient entity.
    MenuItem
    Entity representing a menu item in the system.
    MenuItemController
    REST Controller for managing Menu Item-related operations.
    MenuItemRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on MenuItem entities.
    Order
    Entity representing a customer order in the system.
    OrderController
    REST Controller for managing Order-related operations.
    OrderInventory
    Entity representing the inventory items used as extras or modifications for an order item.
    OrderInventoryRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on OrderInventory entities.
    OrderInventorySerializer
    Custom serializer for the OrderInventory entity.
    OrderItem
    Entity representing an item within a customer order.
    OrderItemRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on OrderItem entities.
    OrderItemSerializer
    Custom serializer for the OrderItem entity.
    OrderRepository
    Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Order entities.
    OrderSerializer
    Custom serializer for the Order entity.
    Position
    Enum representing the possible positions of employees within the system.
    SaleHistoryItem
    Projection interface for representing sales history data.
    SaleItem
    Projection interface for representing sales data of menu items.
    SecurityConfiguration
    Security Configuration class for setting up HTTP security and role-based authorization.
